summary: Plan scope is missing test files. The API Testing SOP requires all endpoints to have corresponding tests, but scope.include does not reference any test file paths.

findings.evidence: scope.include lists api/app.py, ui/app.js, ui/index.html but does not include any test file (e.g., api/test_app.py)

formatted_findings: - [ERROR] api-testing-sop (API Testing Requirements): scope.include lists api/app.py, ui/app.js, ui/index.html but does not include any test file (e.g., api/test_app.py)
